back: Button title for the back button
install-accept: Button to install the web application
install-decline: Button to decline the install of the web application
install-prompt:
Prompt to the user to install the web app on their device.
Parameters:
1. name
menu-home: Label for home page in the menu
menu-search: Label for search page in the menu
name: Name of the app
welcome-desc:
Description used on user's initial visit.
Parameters:
1. searching
2. providing
welcome-title: Heading used on user's initial visit
